title: 求大神说下能量转换的比例
txt_content: 最近玩了几个整合，1EU=4RF,工业转热力的电，那AE,KJ,这些电转换比例是多少QWQ【无魔改的】

replies.author: z910633510
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 z910633510 于 2018-10-8 03:58 编辑 

INDUSTRIAL CRAFT 2
1 EU = 2 AE
THERMAL EXPANSION 4
1 EU = 4 RF
ROTARY CRAFT 
1 EU = 22300 WATTS/JOULES
MEKANISM
5 J = 1 AE
急需金粒 谢谢

replies.author: z910633510
replies.txt_content: 话说在这里会不会被举报灌水
